snippet: Some of California’s best-known chefs, like Thomas Keller, began a full-course press on the state’s legislators on Monday, hoping to prevent the ban from taking effect.
abstract: Some of California’s best-known chefs begin pressuring the state’s legislators, hoping to prevent a ban on products derived from force feeding birds; law, which would effectively bar foie gras from restaurant menus, is set to take effect in July 2012.
lead_paragraph: Some of California’s best-known chefs, like Thomas Keller, began a full-course press on the state’s legislators on Monday, hoping to prevent the ban from taking effect.

headline.seo: Calif. Chefs Fight State’s Foie Gras Ban
headline.main: California Chefs to Wield Their Spatulas in Fight Over Foie Gras Ban
headline.print_headline: California Chefs to Wield Their Spatulas in Fight Over Foie Gras Ban
